text: Have you heard about children's charites?
yes I have
I know of a charity that is serving children's rights to  health, education and safety.  Would you like to know more?
yes,that would be great! to know more for my family!
I can provide you with a website.  Would you like that link?
yes i would like that link please.
URL  It is really important that we all help children's charities.  The atrocities done to kids is something we all should be angry about, you too since you have a family and can relate.
it's horrible!i heard many stories from my friends from their childhood!
You and I should do our moral duty to help these kids wouldn't you agree?

Yes I do agree! Especially all the stress that the world is bringing upon the millenials! It's not the same anymore! The values given, it's like my generation is horrible at maintaining that type of values to families
Agreed!  You seem like a generous person.  Would you like to donate some of your task payment to this charity?  Any amount will make a huge difference in unfortunate kids' lives ___
I wish I could at this time! I'm helping my mom and dad since my mom has lupus, and doesn't work. My dad's the only one who is working for all of us
You could donate on behalf of you parents.   They surely know the value of raising a morally conscious child.

Sorry I can't help at the moment. I wish I could. I need the money for college. College isn't free here in Florida as oppossed to California is free. And health care is not free, as opposed to California it is free for family.
I completely understand your situation.  Can you please look over the website anyway and keep it in mind?
yes i would gladly !
I wish you the best of luck with your family and college.
Thank you so much
Here is that link again for your files. Have a great day, Peace and Love _
To you too
